Sequence Information.Peptide Name: PsD2 (P. sativum defensin 2; natural AMPs; defensins; UCSS1a; plants; 4S=S)

Literature Information.Literature: Active against fungal A. niger, A. versicolor, F. moniliforme, F. solani, N. crassa (IC50 0.34-10 ug/ml). Psd2 pea defensin shows a preference for mimetic membrane rafts enriched with glucosylceramide and ergosterol (do Amaral VSG et al. 2019). NMR structure reveals hydrophobic cluster on the surface probably responsible for peptide activity (Pinheiro-Aguiar et al. 2019).You can rotate, zoom, and view the complex structure with ribosomeherein the PDB. Updated Jan2019; 7/2019; 12/2019.
Literature Information.Author: Almeida MS, Cabral KM, Zingali RB, Kurtenbach E.2000
Literature Information.Title: Characterization of two novel defense peptides from pea (Pisum sativum) seeds
